HadCM3: Grid definition


The grid orientation is west to east, north to south.

Upper left corner Upper right corner
I=1, J=1 (0.0 E, 90.0 N) I=96, J=1 (356.25 E, 90.0 N)

Lower left corner Lower right corner
I=1, J=73 (0.0 E, 90.0 S) I=96, J=73 (356.25 E, 90.0 S)

CAUTION
——-

The vector properties like 10 metre wind come in on a sligthly
different grid. As a matter of fact, 10 metre Windspeed resides
on a 96X72 grid.

The grid orientation is west to east, north to south.

Upper left corner Upper right corner
I=1, J=1 (0.0 E, 88.75 N) I=96, J=1 (356.25 E, 88.75 N)

Lower left corner Lower right corner
I=1, J=72 (0.0 E, 88.75 S) I=96, J=72 (356.25 E, 88.75 S)

The 72 Latitudes of vector grid (10 metre Windspeed)
